page.title: 18TRAFFIC COUNT ON THE A303.
page.content: A traffic count was made at Winterbourne Stoke Hill on the A303, which is a single carriageway main trunk route between London and the West of England. The count was taken at peak holiday time on a sunny Saturday morning in August 1985. The count of vehicles in both directions per hour was as follows: Cars travelling West = 934 Caravans travelling West = 60 Coaches travelling West = 4 Lorries travelling West = 0 Cars travelling East = 806 Caravans travelling East = 52 Coaches travelling East = 12 Lorries travelling East = 78 The traffic was flowing quite steadily at approximately 40 m.p.h. with no major hold ups.
